dict.acceptation: 民族；人们；〈口〉家属，亲戚；民间音乐；
民间的；普通平民的；流传民间的；普通百姓的；

sent.orig: I play folk music on the flute. Folk music sounds wonderful.
sent.trans: 我用笛子演奏民乐。民乐听起来很好听。

sent.orig: The scientific classification of folk organizations is the prerequisite of the scientific management of folk organizations.
sent.trans: 民间组织的科学分类是民间组织科学管理的前提。

sent.orig: Ancient folk song and long poem are the most representative works of Hmong Folk Literature.
sent.trans: 苗族民间文学中最具代表性的是古歌与民间长诗。

sent.orig: Embroidery and folk-custom supplement each other, it is one of folk-custom activity serious content.
sent.trans: 刺绣与民俗相辅相成，是民俗活动中的一个重要内容。

sent.orig: In large part, folk music is folk singing.
